clauses.title: This service's add-on may view your browser history
clauses.description: The service can view your search history and the websites you visit, which is an extremely intrusive way of collecting information that may include personal and/or sensitive data.
clauses.clause_text: When using Pearltrees, certain information about your browsing on third-party sites will also be collected only when you enable the Pearltrees plug-ins registration feature on your web browser.

case.text: Your browsing history can be viewed by the service

clauses.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text:
Cookies can
also have advertising applications and we may enable our business partners to
use their cookies and other tracking technologies.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text:
Pearltrees shall
be entitled to modify these T&Cs at any point in time, in order to adapt
them to the changes in its Platform and/or its Service, but also in order to
take into consideration any changes in the laws or regulations.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: The service can delete your account without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: Pearltrees may terminate users for any reason, but they will be informed in most cases in advance.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.
clauses.clause_text:
In the event of a
dispute, the Users may resort to contractual mediation or any other alternative
mode of settlement of disputes.

case.text: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: Your profile is combined across various products
clauses.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.
clauses.clause_text:
We receive and process a number of elements of information that may include your personal data when you access and use the Platform, and in particular when:

-       . you fill in any form providing information on the Platform, such as upon registration or when you update the information of your user account,

 

-       . you link your account on the Platform to an account opened on a third party web site or social network (e.g. Facebook, Google, Twitter), within the limits permitted by the confidentiality parameters that you shall have defined on the third party web site involved.

case.text: Your profile is combined across various products

clauses.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text:
We may also
use your personal data in order to send you information that might be of
interest to you, concerning the Platform and our services, or to send you
marketing,

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.
clauses.clause_text:
We are also required to keep your connection data in application of French law "LCEN" n ° 2004-575 of June 21, 2004.

 

-      .

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text: Your personal data may also be communicated to the police (if required by law) or to any person legally authorized to receive this information (by order of the judge).

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: Pearltrees is hosted by Amazon AWS and therefore shares users personal data with Amazon Services.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text: advertising or commercial information about new services similar to those that you already use on the Platform. This processing of your personal data is thus in this respect founded on our legitimate interest to communicate about our services to already registered users.

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: We use Google Analytics to analyse our Internet audience. Therefore, Google may also place cookies on your terminal.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions
clauses.clause_text: To deactivate Google Analytics, Users should visit Google’s deactivation page and install the additional module for browsers available at the following address: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout?hl=fr.

case.text: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: In accordance with France’s data protection law of 6 January 1978, as subsequently modified, Users have a right to object to, to access, rectify, port and request the erasure of their personal data, as well as a right to oppose its processing on legitimate grounds, by contacting the School of the Account or Pearltrees:

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: Prohibits public posting of private messages
clauses.description: The service does not allow users to publicly post private messages they have received from other users.
clauses.clause_text: "Users must however check the content that they choose to make available and must not publish a Collection that aggregates content: [...] That violates the secrecy of private correspondence;"

case.text: You aren’t allowed to publicly post private messages

clauses.title: You can delete your content from this service
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.
clauses.clause_text:
All the data linked to
their accounts shall then be eliminated unless the User request the portability
of its data.

case.text: You can delete your content from this service

clauses.title: The service provides a complete list of all marketing cookies set by its website
clauses.description: The service provides users with a complete list of all first and third party cookies its website sets and an explanation of their uses. This information can be valuable for users to make an informed choice whether to allow those cookies.
clauses.clause_text:
We use more specifically the following marketing cookies:

-      . Criteo

-      . OpenX

-      . Google Adsense

-      . Google Adx

-      . Google DFP double click

-      . Komoona

 

C. .

case.text: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided

clauses.title: The services will notify users if personal data has been affected by data breaches
clauses.description: Should the personal information of a service be compromised, the service will inform users if any personal data has been affected by data breaches. This case is also related to privacy.
clauses.clause_text: Any security breach shall however be notified to you in strict compliance with the applicable regulations.

case.text: You will be notified if personal data has been affected by data breaches

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: Users may close their accounts from their profile at any point in time.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
clauses.description: The service rejects any responsibility for the contents of other websites to which it links.
clauses.clause_text: The Platform and the Account may comprise hypertext links pointing to third party sites. The links pointing to these third party sites do not imply any approval of these third party sites by Pearltrees. Pearltrees has no control over the information, products and/or services proposed by third parties on the abovementioned sites, and hereby disclaims any liability in this respect.

case.text: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

clauses.title: The service has a no refund policy
clauses.description: Payments are final and can't be refunded unless required by law.
clauses.clause_text:
Termination does
not result in any refund of the premium subscription price unless otherwise
specified by Pearltrees.

case.text: The service has a no refund policy

clauses.title: The service can distribute your content through any media known now or in the future
clauses.clause_text:
enabling Pearltrees to use, to
communicate to members of the public, to reproduce, to adapt, to modify, to
transmit and to disseminate this Collection on any medium, worldwide, for the
legal duration of the protection of the intellectual property rights.

case.text: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future

clauses.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
clauses.description: You card will be billed on recurring basis unless cancelled. For instance, monthly or annual subscriptions.
clauses.clause_text: If the User decides to subscribe to a higher premium offer during the subscription, the subscription renewal date will be reset and billing for the first month or year of the new service level will be calculated according to its past and new subscription.

case.text: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text:
Users may opt to deactivate cookies. Your browser may also be configured to report any cookies that are deposited on your computer and to prompt you to accept or reject them. You may then accept or reject cookies on a case-by-case basis or opt to reject them systematically.

Please note that such a configuration may however affect your ability to access any content and services that require the use of cookies.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.
clauses.clause_text:
Pearltrees shall
do everything in its power to guarantee uninterrupted access to the Platform
and to the Account and continuous provision of the Service but may not under
any circumstance bear liability if, due to any unavailability linked to
maintenance operations or to a failure of the Internet network or any other
reason beyond its control or force majeure, a User cannot temporarily access
the Platform and/or the Account.

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: This service does not allow alternative accounts
clauses.description:
Services that do not allow multiple or alternative accounts are covered by this case.
Alternative accounts can contribute to an increased privacy, but can also be used to manipulate discussions and polls and might decrease the trustworthiness of a person.
clauses.clause_text: Open more than one User account or open an account usurping the identity of a third party,

case.text: Alternative accounts are not allowed

clauses.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
Subject to
compliance with these T&Cs, Pearltrees also grants the Users a right to
access and to use the Platform and the Account and the elements reproduced for
their personal, non-commercial use and for purposes in keeping with the normal
purpose of the Service, for duration of its subscription to the Service.

case.text: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

clauses.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text: Use the Service to disseminate inappropriate content (content that is illegal, defamatory, insulting, racist, runs counter to human dignity, or any other content that may incur civil or criminal liability),

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: This service prohibits users from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
clauses.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.
clauses.clause_text:
That
provides access to computer viruses or any other code or program designed to
interrupt, destroy or limit the functionality of any software application,
computer or telecommunication tool, this list not being exhaustive

case.text: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

clauses.title: Prohibits the posting of content which promotes or glorifies violence or politically or religiously extremist values.
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post extremist political or religious content. They are also not allowed to post content that glorifies violence.
clauses.clause_text:
Users must however check the content that they choose to make available and must not publish a Collection that aggregates content:

-         . That can be construed as an apology for crimes against humanity or war crimes;

-         . That violates the respect and dignity of human beings, the protection of children and teenagers, e.g. violent, child abuse messages;

-         . That runs counter to the public interest or to public morals;

-         . That is threatening, insulting, constitutes harassment, is defamatory or harmful;

case.text: You are prohibited from posting content which promotes violence or politically or religiously extremist values.

clauses.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
clauses.description: The content you have published on the service may be removed if it infringes copyright.
clauses.clause_text: Pearltrees must withdraw any content that is clearly unlawful and that is notified to it in keeping with the formalities laid down by article 6-1-5 LCEN.

case.text: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed

clauses.title: This service requires first-party cookies
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text:
We may insert cookies
belonging to us on your terminal via the Platform.

case.text: First-party cookies are used

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
clauses.clause_text: Should any provisions of the T&Cs turn out to be inapplicable for any reason whatsoever, such as due to an applicable statute or regulation, the Parties shall remain bound by the other provisions of the T&Cs and shall endeavour to remedy the inapplicable clauses in the spirit that prevailed upon formation of the contract between them.

case.text: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text: It is the responsibility of the Users who are registered to keep their Identifiers confidential.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
clauses.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.
clauses.clause_text:
Should any of the
Parties fail to avail themselves of a given provision of these T&Cs at any
point in time, this shall not be interpreted as being tantamount to a waiver of
their right to avail themselves subsequently of any provision of these

case.text: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

clauses.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: This connection data are your IP address, the date and time when you accessed or used the Platform, your operating system, your connection type, your mobile terminal type.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location France
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").
clauses.clause_text:
These T&Cs are
governed by French law.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
